original_title: 아동학대 자진신고 1년의 기록: 내 이웃의 아이
overview: In April of last year, the mother of a child voluntarily reported child abuse to the police. Monitoring for over a year, a mother who confessed her wrongdoing, the film acts not as an investigative agency, but as a disinterested party which records the point where daily discipline turns into abuse.
title: The Child Next Door: A Yearlong Record After Self-reporting of Child Abuse
